item.description:
Experience fine dining at the most elegant restaurant in the area at an amazing price. For a limited time Truffles is offering a special 3 course menu at only $19.95 (plus tax and gratuity).

Now's the time to experience great food, great service, and great ambiance at a great price.

Limited to the first 6 lucky people who RSVP.

http://www.trufflesgr...

TARP
TRUFFLES APPETITE RELIEF PLAN
focusing on locally raised, grown and caught ingredients

Appetizer
Spinach Salad
Baby spinach tossed with warm bacon vinaigrette,
with hardboiled egg, mushrooms, and crumbled bacon
~or~
Summer Corn Soup

Entrée
Pan-fried Rib Eye Steak
thin, bone-in rib eye panfried with garlic,
served with mashed potato and summer vegetables
~or~
Hoisin Glazed Salmon
Hoisin marinated, pan seared, served over
basmati rice with summer vegetables

Dessert
Peach Torte
~or~
Crème Brulee
item.name: Dinner at Truffles this Friday
